name: Metaverse Exchange
description: A technology park Metaverse for cryptocurrency projects which need audit, development, design, legal, marketing and listing services. The MetaCex token is used in land transactions and ownership of land is the only way to get access to the technology park services. The Metaverse Exchange team has real world experience with industrial technology parks in China and have expansive knowledge on how they are important to startup companies. MetaCex uses this same strategy to to help small to medium sized cryptocurrency projects grow.
